title: 'We'll destroy his career,' Trump jokes at meeting with county sheriffs - The Washington Post
text: 'We'll destroy his career,' Trump jokes at meeting with county sheriffs Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Speaking to local county sheriffs at a meeting on Feb. 7 at the White House, President Trump joked that his administration would "destroy" the career of a state senator.
